cast.overview: One day at work, unsuccessful puppeteer Craig finds a portal into the head of actor John Malkovich. The portal soon becomes a passion for anybody who enters its mad and controlling world of overtaking another human body.
cast.title: Being John Malkovich

details.biography: William Buck is an actor known for his role as Mr. Christian in 8mm (1999). He also appeared in Over the Top (1987) as Doctor (under the name William Nichols Buck) and in Being John Malkovich (1999) as Lester's Friend (under the name William N. Buck).
details.name: William Buck
